name: Floof's Fury
description:
Help Floof send these monsters back to where they came from!

Controls

======================

WASD to move

Left click to shoot

Weapons

======================

NarGun

Moderate speed, damage and shoot rate

PufferRifle

Fast speed, low damage, fast shoot rate

ClamBlaster

Slow speed, high damage, slow shoot rate

Notes

=======================

The game works in waves, 5 waves in total :)
